review: this is the game that made me a fan of this type of game  i originally got it with playstation plus and got it again on sale on pc  i really enjoy the turned based style and everything this game offers  it isnt terribly complex either
i love this game its got everything i want in a turnbased squad tactics game

excellent stealthbased puzzle game by the amazing developers over at klei  agent choice team composition cybernetic implants espionage devices mission selection all of these things need to be taken into consideration as all of them are crucial to success  level layout is random so some missions are much more difficult than others due to rng but that just makes the success more satisfying  8610
my favorite klei game its a perfect game 1010 very replayable its like playing chess levels can be hard for new players i pretend that the contingency plan dlc doesnt exist
really tight tactical stealth gameplay unlike the modern xcoms actually keeps the feeling of intensity late into the campaign great visual and audio design too scratched the xcom itch for me
i love the idea of a more explicitly cyberpunkthemed xcom but also this game apparently left no impression on me whatsoever because i literally totally forgot that i owned  played it sideways thumb
a good xcomstyle game but is lacking in replayability got my moneys worth so ill give this a thumbs up

fantastic stealth strategy game dont know why i havent reviewed this years ago one of my favorite games on steam i even bought a physical edition of the game years back i dont think i need to say anything else

randomlygenerated levels tight decisionmaking chill gameplay great art i love this game and replay it often

cool turnbased spy game it is also a stealth game until you make it not  never ever give your ai system the freedom to choose control and direct your actions in any circumstances regardless of how well your failsafe proctocol is installed things never turn out fine in the end and that includes the art department irl  rating 78

you know a game is a masterpiece when its turn based yet parts of it play in your mind like the escape sequence of a heist movie this game is the very definition of a game is a series of interesting choices every action you take is a challenging riskreward decision that will keep you on your toes until your agents make the tense run for the exit pad after the excellent 2d action stealth game mark of the ninja klei shows it can do it just as well with a turn based isometric game

really enjoyed this game which is why i played for over 300 hours each failure made me want to start over the story was simple but effective the satisfaction of beating a level without getting seen is like nothing else in gaming

not a big fan of the artstyle even if its pretty well executed but after pushing myself to give it a try i really enjoyed it  this is a solid and really focused little turnbased tactical game instead of mission timers giving you a hard gameover playing slow will incrementally make things harder for yourself if you like xcom and want to play something more compact with a focus on stealth and hacking instead of just dispatching enemies with explosives this is for you

i love this game super addicted to it early on and mods have only renewed my love for it while i do wish there was some more diversity in mapsskins and the map generation it is super fun on its own the game is very forgiving making it very easy for new players story is nothing to write home about  but does set the ambience well  i hope they make a sequel to this game or some successor
